package.name: cpr_robots_driver
package.description:
This stack contains hardware drivers, urdf files and keyboard teleop for the Commonplace Robotics robots: robot arm Mover4 and mobile platform Slider, see: www.cpr-robots.com.
Specifically, it provides in package cpr_robots_hwinterface:
node CPRKinSlider to connect with the Slider hardware
The package cpr_robots_teleop contains:
node CPRTeleopKeyboard to allow testing the robot
package.author: Christian Meyer
